level.heading: Withdrawal deemed on conversion to domestic filing entity or domestic limited liability partnership.
level.text: A registered foreign entity that converts to any type of domestic filing entity or to a domestic limited liability partnership shall be deemed to have withdrawn its registration on the effective date of the conversion.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: The 2013 amendment by D.C. Law 19-210 substituted "registered foreign entity that" for "qualified foreign entity registered to do business in the District which"; and "domestic" for "domestic registered".

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-378
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Application of Law 19-210: Section 7 of D.C. Law 19-210 provided that the act shall apply as of January 1, 2012.
